Granicus | Multiple Positions | Denver, CO

Granicus makes local and state government more efficient and transparent. We are the leader in our space and serve over 1000 government organizations including the US House and Senate.

We are looking for talented and passionate polyglot (or interested in becoming polyglot) engineers to join our team. We use a number of languages and frameworks, including Rails, PHP, .NET, Java, ReactJS and even some Go. We are passionate about engineering practices and the craft of software development. If you share those values, and want to learn with us, we'd love to meet you.

Email me personally, javier at granicus dot com.
